Authors:
lin he, Hong Cheng, Aye Aye Htun, Hui Ge, ZHEN ZHOU XIA,
jian wei guo, Jian Xin Deng, tao du
Title:
Phylogeny and taxonomy of two new Alternaria (Ascomycota:
Pleosporaceae) species in section Gypsophilae from China
Abstract:
During investigation of pathogenic Alternaria in China,
nine Alternaria isolates were obtained from two Caryophyllaceae plants.
Based on morphological and multilocus phylogenetic approaches and
pathogenicity tests, three pathogenic species of Alternaria including
two new species and a new record in China were identified.
Phylogenetically, the present species were confirmed and grouped within
two clades out of three in section Gypsophilae: clade I (Alternaria
hispanica sp. nov. and A. vaccariae) and clade II (Alternaria barbata
sp. nov.). Morphological comparison was conducted between the two new
species and their closely related ones which verified the phylogenetic
results. The two novel species were described and illustrated here.
